toc.text: 实验性脚本（仅 TUNA 提供）

pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","h2",null,{"id":"实验性脚本仅-tuna-提供","children":"实验性脚本（仅 TUNA 提供）"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如需克隆 QEMU 代码及其子模块，使用以下脚本"}],"
",["$r","SyntaxHighlight",null,{"code":"curl https://mirrors.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/git/qemu/qemu.sh | bash"}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"手动克隆","children":"手动克隆"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"如仅需克隆 QEMU 代码，使用"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git clone {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"若要将 mirror 加入已有代码库，可在已有仓库中运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote add mirror {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或运行"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"git remote set-url origin {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"将默认上游设置为镜像站"}]]}]

meta.title: QEMU Git 镜像使用帮助
